name: The Satisfaction of a Job Well Done (Sandwich VR Baboo Edition 2.0)
name_original: The Satisfaction of a Job Well Done (Sandwich VR Baboo Edition 2.0)
description:
The most relaxing sandwich sim ever has finally arrived on Google Cardboard.

Have you ever wanted to make a delicious sandwich but couldn't get in the mood due to a lack of beaches and/or ukuleles? Does nothing fill you with satisfaction quite like gazing upon a beautiful 3D, polygonal piece of pastrami?

This is the game for you.

"It'll blow you away." - IGN

"Better than Chief Beef" - Redacted

System Requirements:

Must be cool to play.

Google Cardboard headset and Android phone needed.

If you'd like to see the game in all its glory but you don't have a headset, check out this link: https://youtu.be/WPAda28E5wo
